definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Always drink when you are thirsty, and have water available during the day to hydrate regularly.
sentences.chinese: 總是喝當你渴了，有水可在白天到水合物定期。

sentences.english: This paper reports the experiment on the heat storage-release property of the trihydrate sodium acetate system.
sentences.chinese: 報道了三水合醋酸鈉體系蓄放熱性能的實驗研究。

sentences.english: Proper hydration is vital to good health and to have that, you need to drink pure water.
sentences.chinese: 適當的水合作用對身體好是重要的，您需要喝純淨水。

sentences.english: An improved precipitation system is provided for the Bayer process production of alumina hydrate.
sentences.chinese: 改進的降水系統提供的氧化鋁水合物拜耳法生產。

sentences.english: The reaction conditions of the direct hydration of cyclohexene were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了環己烯直接水合製備環己醇的工藝條件。

sentences.english: Gum Arabic is a natural hydrocolloid.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉伯樹膠是純天然的水合膠體。

sentences.english: NASA has found lines of "hydrated" salt minerals on Mars.
sentences.chinese: 美國航空航天局在火星上發現了水合鹽礦物的條紋。

sentences.english: In the end, the author hopes it may provide some useful clues to the exploration of gas hydrate.
sentences.chinese: 企望對加速天然氣水合物的勘探提供一些有益的線索。

sentences.english: A new direct hydration catalyst for preparing alcohols from dicyclopentadiene was studied.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種烯烴水合制醇的新方法。

sentences.english: The process of hydration of cyclohexene to prepare cyclohexanol was industrialized in Japan in 1990.
sentences.chinese: 1990年日本實現了環已烯水合制環已醇的工業化。

sentences.english: Hydrates are formed as the condensate and water fall to the lower liquid section.
sentences.chinese: 在凝析液和水落入分離器下部液體段時形成水合物。

sentences.english: The altiplano tundra is a potential source of the formation and preservation of nature gas hydrate.
sentences.chinese: 高原凍土帶是天然氣水合物生成和保存的潛在源區。

sentences.english: The article gives a review of the application of hydrazine hydrate in the synthesis of agrochemicals.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了水合肼在各種農藥合成中的應用。

sentences.english: Low hydrated zinc borate was synthesized, and part of its physical constants were determined.
sentences.chinese: 合成了低水合硼酸鋅，測定了它的部分物理常數。

sentences.english: Experimental researches for improving the heat storage performance of sodium acetate trihydrate;
sentences.chinese: 報道了三水合醋酸鈉體系蓄放熱性能的實驗研究。

sentences.english: The salt-removing effect during formation of gas hydrate was dominated by methane consumption.
sentences.chinese: 水合物生成引起的排鹽效應主要取決於耗氣量。

definition: stratum corneum (outermost layer of the skin)
